name: Mahjong Domino Free - A Brain Game of Puzzle
name_original: Mahjong Domino Free - A Brain Game of Puzzle
description:
Mahjong Domino = Mahjong + Tetris
The most unique and fun game at Android, iOS and Mac OS!

Thank you for viewing! Thank you for downloading! Mahjong Domino is a revolutionary game that integrates the classical and the modern into one.

*****Game goal
Continuously remove tiles of either three consecutive tiles, or three/four identical tiles, until the pool gets full. For examples, remove tiles of 1-2-3, 9-9-9, 5-5-5-5 and so on.

*****Game rules
*Two tiles will be selected randomly and dropped from the top each time.
*You align them together so that they are in removable groups through operations of rotating, moving, fast-dropping.
*Game continues until the pool is full.
